DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether the use of a bioelectric wound dressing is effective in the healing of skin graft donor site wounds.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of a Bioelectric Dressing to Treat Skin Graft Donor Site Wounds
